entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
